mapper.select: SELECT c.* ,b.film_name,b.image_src,b.type,b.time,b.price, (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(seat.`row`,'/',seat.`column`) from seat where seat.film_s_id = film_scene_id) as seat FROM `film_scene` c left JOIN film1 b on b.id=c.film_id WHERE c.film_scene_id=#{filmSceneId}
